parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Row number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

parameters.name: Col
parameters.description: Column number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

title: IBomTable.GetEntryValue
description: Gets the contents of the specified cell.
signature:
System.Object GetEntryValue( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Col
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Row number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

parameters.name: Col
parameters.description: Column number of the desired cell; this is a 0-based index

returns: Object containing the information from the specified cell
remarks:
After you receive a valid return value, you can evaluate the for the object's data type.
To return the cell contents as a string, use
IBomTable::GetEntryText
.
Before you use any of the IBomTable methods, activate the BOM table using
IBomTable::Attach3
. After you finish getting BOM data, use
IBomTable::Detach
to deactivate the table.
